        public void usePowerUp(ColorId colorPlayer,
                       Color ammoColor)
                throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        this method add a damage to target player
        Parameters:
        colorPlayer - the player that will get the extra damage
        ammoColor - the color of ammo to use for the payment
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there aren't enough blue ammo
